name: Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc.
description: Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc. (HII) is the largest military shipbuilding company in the United States and a provider of professional services to partners in government and industry. Founded in 1886, HII has a rich history of building some of the most advanced and complex ships for the U.S. Navy and Coast Guard. The company specializes in designing, building, and maintaining nuclear-powered submarines and aircraft carriers, as well as surface ships. With a workforce of over 40,000 dedicated professionals, HII operates from multiple shipyards, including Newport News Shipbuilding in Virginia and Ingalls Shipbuilding in Mississippi. The company is committed to innovation and sustainability, focusing on advanced technologies, including automation and digital design, to enhance shipbuilding processes. Beyond shipbuilding, HII provides a wide array of services, including logistics, engineering, and research and development, to support national defense and security. HII is proud of its legacy and is focused on its mission to deliver superior quality and performance while upholding the highest standards of ethics and integrity. The company aims to strengthen America’s maritime capabilities and ensure the safety and security of its customers and stakeholders.

seo.meta_title: Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc. | Leading Military Shipbuilder
seo.meta_description: Learn about Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc., the largest military shipbuilding company in the U.S., and its commitment to innovation in defense technology.

faq.question: What does Huntington Ingalls Industries specialize in?
faq.answer: Huntington Ingalls Industries specializes in military shipbuilding and providing professional services to government and industry.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Huntington Ingalls Industries?
faq.answer: Kathy Warden is the CEO of Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Huntington Ingalls Industries headquartered?
faq.answer: Huntington Ingalls Industries is headquartered in Newport News, Virginia, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of Huntington Ingalls Industries?
faq.answer: The main products include nuclear submarines, aircraft carriers, and surface ships, along with engineering and logistics services.

faq.question: When was Huntington Ingalls Industries founded?
faq.answer: Huntington Ingalls Industries was founded in 1886.
